effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.gold_silver: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.crystal: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.gold_silver: An attack that may inflict a burn.
flavor_text.crystal: An attack that may inflict a burn.
